name: MysteryShoppa
tag_list: mystery-shopping, mystery-shopping-software, secret-shopping, legit-mystery-shopping, marketing-software, market-research, market-research-software, mobile-software, real-time-software, automated-software
overview:
ABOUT MYSTERYSHOPPA

MysteryShoppa is a new system that connects businesses with customers. The process begins by creating a custom survey and selecting your demographics using our website. We then broadcast your survey to our mobile app users.

The mystery shoppers use the mobile app to return the requested information and they receive rewards for completing the assignment.

We use our GPS tracking technology to verify a mystery shoppers location when carrying out such assignments, therefore this provides greater accuracy when pin pointing problem areas within your business.

MysteryShoppa can also be used as a promotions tool for attracting new customers and groups of customers to your stores.

Visit www.mysteryshoppa.com to find out more.

Visit www.mysteryshoppa.com/business to watch our service video.
